# CoreRush.Fit

CoreRush.Fit is a fitness and lifestyle booking platform in India. Users can discover, compare, and book classes across trusted partner studios using a flexible credits-based membership.

## Primary URLs
- Home: https://corerush.fit/
- Download App: https://corerush.fit/download.html
- Terms of Service: https://corerush.fit/terms.html
- Privacy Policy: https://corerush.fit/privacy-policy.html
- Account Deactivation: https://corerush.fit/deactivate.html

## Mobile Apps
- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/corerushfit/id6755691830
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fit.corerush.core_rush_mobile

## Brand And Contact
- Brand: CoreRush.Fit
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/corerush.fit
- Support: mailto:support@corerush.fit

## Product Scope
- Fitness class discovery by location, schedule, and class type.
- Instant booking across partner studios.
- Credits-based membership access.
- Class categories include fitness, dance, yoga/pilates, and recovery.
